item.description:
SAT June 11 at 7:30pm * CONNECTICUT PREMIER
of Tony Award Nominated Comedy [title of show]

Don’t miss the CONNECTICUT PREMIER Tony Award Nominated Comedy [title of show]

[title of show] is a musical comedy that is called “the perfect show for anyone who has ever followed a dream.”

A love letter to musical theatre and to the joy of collaboration “[title of show]” is a charming new musical about two struggling young writers writing a new musical about two struggling young writers writing a new musical.

In the span of 90 minutes, the pair, along with the help of two friends, write and perform their show-within-a-show at a musical theatre festival, and along the way learn lessons about themselves as people, friends and artists.

Post Party for all Connecticut Theatre Group Ticket Holders

We will meet at Newington Mainstage starting at 7pm, Show starts at 7:30, Afterparty folows the show

Advance Tickets are $25

Tickets are $30 at the event

Newington Mainstage
NCTC Black Box Theatre
743 North Mountain Road
Newington, CT 06111

FREE SAFE PARKING


Info will be emailed to all CT Theatre Group Ticket holders

Pick up your ticket before the show with the CT Theatre Group, or at the will call window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CT THEATRE GROUP SECTION -THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit www.CTTheatre.com or CLICK HERE
Call (860) 987-7888
